entry.title: 责任链模式
entry.content:
1、简单的责任链模式

package com.example.demo.interfaces;import java.util.ArrayList;public class FilterChanel {    private ArrayList<Filter> filterList = new ArrayList<>();    public void addFilters(Filter filter) {        this.filterList.add(filter);    }    public void doChanelFilter() {        for (Filter filter : filterList) {            filter.doFilter();        }    }}
public interface Filter {    void doFilter();}
public class FilterOne implements Filter{    @Override    public void doFilter() {        System.out.println("filter one");    }}
public class FilterTwo implements Filter{    @Override    public void doFilter() {        System.out.println("filter two");    }}
public class FilterChanel {    private ArrayList<Filter> filterList = new ArrayList<>();    public void addFilters(Filter filter) {        this.filterList.add(filter);    }    public void doChanelFilter() {        for (Filter filter : filterList) {            filter.doFilter();        }    }}

2、管道-责任链模式
